alert.note: Alert for Cass; Logan; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 10:44AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM TO BRING A WINTRY MIXTURE OF PRECIPITATION AND HEAVY SNOW TO PARTS OF CENTRAL ILLINOIS LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Illinois, west from Springfield and Lincoln. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very hazardous road conditions. The hazardous conditions may impact the morning commute, with significant impacts during the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A change from rain to a mixture of sleet and freezing rain will occur Thursday morning. This mixture will change to all snow during the early afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
